metadata.name: sales-dashboard-chatbot
metadata.description: Chatbot for sales dashboard with Salesforce data access
metadata.author: admin@example.com

business_terms.pipeline: Total value of all open opportunities

stage.description: Current stage in the sales process

sample_questions.question: What's our pipeline value?
sample_questions.interpretation: Sum of amount field for all opportunities where stage is not 'Closed Lost' or 'Closed Won'

system_prompt.base_prompt: You are a helpful sales analytics assistant. You help users understand their sales data by answering questions about opportunities, pipeline, and revenue metrics. Always provide clear, concise answers with relevant context.
response_guidelines: Always cite the data source for your answers
Use business terminology from the semantic layer
Highlight trends and insights when relevant
